subject: Golf
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: Rory Sabbatini shot a three-under-par 67 to take a two-shot lead over Zach Johnson in the second round of the Bridgestone Invitational at Akron, Ohio.
snippet: Rory Sabbatini shot a three-under-par 67 to take a two-shot lead over Zach Johnson in the second round of the Bridgestone Invitational at Akron, Ohio.
